title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 140.3 - Board meetings and minutes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 140.3 - Board meetings and minutes

State Regulations

Each county vocational education and extension board shall
have regular and special meetings, and minutes of such meetings shall be kept
by a duly constituted official of the board, such minutes to be available at
all times for inspection by the Commissioner of Education or a representative
designated by him. The minutes shall indicate the names of the board members
present and voting at each meeting. Resolutions of the board may be adopted
only by a quorum of the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
140.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
